Telraam_S2.name: Telraam S2
Telraam_S2.description: The Telraam S2 device counts, categorises and reports all activity on the street

Telraam_V1.name: Telraam V1
Telraam_V1.description: Telraam V1 uses computer vision (OpenCV) on a Raspberry Pi to detect objects in front of a constant (periodically recalculated median) background.
